Privacy.title: Privacy & Data Protection
Privacy.content: KrakenHosting follows strict internal privacy principles:
list: We do not sell customer data.
We do not monitor customer activity.
We do not retain logs unless required by the hosting jurisdiction.
We do not respond to foreign government requests unless legally required under applicable local law.
Privacy.footer: For EU clients, KrakenHosting adheres to GDPR principles, but is not an EU-based entity. See our Privacy Policy for full details.
